Description: Comprehensive view of sales KPIs and comparisons by region and product line.
Breakdown of customer segments, buying habits, and engagement metrics.
Year-over-year and month-over-month revenue breakdowns with growth highlights.
Snapshot of current inventory, stock movement, and forecasted demands.
Measure campaign ROI and conversion rates across digital channels.
Overview of company profitability, balance sheets, and revenue flows.
Track recruitment pipeline and workforce statistics across departments.
Monitor project timelines, completion status, and delivery risks.
View website visitor behavior, acquisition source, and session metrics.
